desc.cn: ws4sqlite 是一个服务器端应用程序，应用于一个或多个 SQLite 文件，允许通过 REST（或更好地说，通过 HTTP 上的 JSON）对它们执行 SQL 查询和语句
desc.en: ws4sqlite is a server-side application that, applied to one or more SQLite files, allows to perform SQL queries and statements on them via REST (or better, JSON over HTTP)

linux/build.cmd:
git clone https://github.com/proofrock/ws4sqlite \
&& cd ws4sqlite
&& make build

darwin/build.cmd:
git clone https://github.com/proofrock/ws4sqlite \
&& cd ws4sqlite
&& make build-nostatic
